name: Crop Season
description:
Share the joy of harvest!

You’ve had a bountiful crop this year!
Drive your truck to visit friends and deliver the veggies they like!
Sometimes you will have to figure out what they’d prefer based on their previous choices.

No time to stop!
Grab the veggies and fling them out the window!
Hope you have a good aim!

Controls

Grab the veggies with the left mouse button.
You can leave them on the counter or fling them by moving the mouse above the line.
Be careful how fast you go - they might fly too far!
Update: You can now play in Fullscreen - press F4 to toggle it!

Objective

Give your friends the vegetables they want.
Remember their preferences to fill in the blanks marked with a question mark.

Credits

Programming: chaikadev
Music and audio integration: melloforge
Art: Dona Vidas (FlyingMobula)

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52.
